Visit our beautiful retail Garden Center and Outdoor Showroom - In The Garden. Get seasonal ideas to freshen up your landscape and consult with our on-site landscape design professionals about ideas for your garden!

Located on Sanibel Island

In The Garden is a tropical garden oasis with wandering paths through display gardens, bountiful plant nursery and garden gift shop.

Want to schedule a group tour?

We would love to share this lovely space with your group or club. If you are interested in scheduling a tour for your group or if your garden club would like to have a meeting in our garden and would like to spend a morning or afternoon exploring our beautiful garden space, please call 239-395-5859.
